page.title: 12 Strawberries
page.content:
Strawberries have always played a major role in our community. From around 1864 the surrounding areas started to grow them.The main strain of strawberry in this country is Gauntlet but others also include Talisman,Vanguard and Soverign.
In the months of May,June and July almost everybody is involved with picking,packing and selling. Nowadays most strawberries in the area are brought on under glass,because the Hampshire strawberries have to be on the market before the Kent counties, when the Kent strawberries are put on the market it is flooded and there is no selling room for Hampshires.
Some of the strawberry growers have had their business's past down over the generations.
